template.description: Complete demo of Schema Generator API. Accepts API Calls to Create Schema Registry Entity, Avro Schema, Hive HQL Schema, and Hive Tables. Includes sample API Calls and Setup Instructions.
template.name: Schema Generator Api Demo

labels.label:
Instructions:
1. Make sure Schema Registry is Setup with NiFi
2. Edit Schema Generator Demo Variables - schemaGeneratorApiHost - schemaGeneratorApiPort - schemaRegistryUrl - hiveDatabaseName - hiveDatabaseConnectionUrl (jdbc string) - hiveConfigurationResources (path to hive-site.xml) 3. Enable Controller Services in Schema Generator API Process Group - StandardHttpContextMap for HandleHttpRequest & Response - HiveConnectionPool for PutHiveQl 3. Start Schema Generator API 4. Execute Sample Call 1 then 2 by switching GenerateFlowFile On/Off
Schema Generator will create Avro and HQL Schemas for Data Sources with larger number of parameters. Creates Schema Registry Entries and Hive Tables.
You can use Connection String OR (not both) hive-site.xml
If you change port from default (9092) change it in HandleHttpResponse too
This Process Group holds Create and Parse Sample calls to the API
Schema Generator API
2. Send Sample Parse Call
Change Sample Data Columns and Data Types Here.
1. Send Sample Create Entity Call
Start and Stop Immediately. Only 1 Execution per Schema Name. Additional Executions will Fail
Start and Stop Immediately. Only 1 Execution per Schema Name. Additional Executions will Fail
Change Schema Name and Hive Table Name Here. Default "demo"
Only execute this call when you confirm call 1 is completed. Call 2 requires Call 1.
Change Schema Name and Hive Table Name Here. Default "demo"
